productInformation.value: #12,101 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #129 in Women's Sports Bras

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Take note of the shipping date, some are 5 star, some are 1 star
reviews.reviewText: It’s very hard to give fair star rating because there are two very different quality rompers that you could end up with.I first bought 2 of these, green & black. The green one arrived with in a couple days, I loved it! Material is great quality, perfect compression, accentuates the shape of your body, cinches in your waist without feeling like you can’t breathe. The color is a bit ash or Heather green, very pretty. Online the picture of the black one looks like the exact same great quality material as the green one, but it’s completely different in person! It took 2 weeks to get here. I was so excited when it arrived but when I opened it, I was very disappointed, it’s paper thin, even though it’s black, you can totally see through it & it’s bigger even though they’re both medium. I want to order more but I’m afraid that I will end up with another one made of the same horrible material as the black one.UPDATEI took a chance & ordered black again & a gray one, I love them both! They both arrived quickly & both are made with the great quality material.From my experience, If the shipping date is within a week, you will get the good quality from the local Amazon warehouse but if it’s gonna be a couple weeks before it arrives, you’re gonna get the crappy one from China.UPDATE #2I ordered 2 more, the light blue and neon pink. The blue one arrived within a couple days & just as I thought, it was the made with the great quality material, I love it! The pink one took a couple weeks & when I opened it, sure enough, it was made of the cheap material & this time it was so small that even if I did like it, I couldn’t even get it over my hips. I’m giving 5 stars because some rompers are worthy of it & the store is very good about refunds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I appreciate most is the versatility of this romper
reviews.reviewText: The spaghetti strap design and one-piece construction give it a sexy yet functional vibe, making it stand out among my activewear collection. The padded sports bra is comfortable and offers just the right amount of coverage. The overall fit is fantastic – it hugs the curves without being too tight, allowing for freedom of movement during various exercises.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a body suit like this because i saw how cute it was on everyone on yt. i was a bit skeptical though about this because it was only like $9 and I didn’t know if a body suit would look good on me. I decided to go for it and i’m so glad i did! i’m 5’8 and 145 lbs and i got my normal size, medium. It fits literally like a dream, a bit short for my long torso but it’s stretchy so it’s all good. I love the padding, it’s pretty supportive. I’m a 34 c/d and it’s a good fit. there is a bit of gapping on my rib cage but that’s fine. And it gives the illusion that i have curves, and i mean coming from someone who looks like a door that’s a lot!!! I was having trouble paring it with things but i found that just a button up cardigan is super cute or hoodie, and since it’s tight you could even wear it with some baggy jeans over it. If your skeptical like me, just try it out, i think it was a great purchase😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black is GREAT
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical to buy this, but for $12 I figured why not.I love it!! I’m fairly petit, 126lbs, small chest. Got the small. I actually feel like I could have managed with a medium, but the fit is tight of course and very flattering.The black one has really nice material, doesn’t feel cheap or thin at all. I love the cups, you don’t need to wear any sort of bra at all. If you have larger chest, you might find this doesn’t work for you.The legs of this do kind of ride up and I found myself adjusting several times throughout the day. Maybe the medium would have been a little better.The top in my photo I also bought from Amazon, it paired perfectly!I can say that I do recommend the black one since that’s all I can speak for. Comfortable to wear, and super cute on!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, kind of cheap looking
reviews.reviewText: For reference, I am 5'2", 120 pounds, 34B bra size, slim build with short torso and long legs.This romper is cute but kind of ill-fitting and looks a little cheap. The material is very thick which is nice, but it is almost too stiff making it a bit uncomfortable at times. The super thick material also means I get a uni-butt unless I really hike this up into my booty. The legs ride up really bad just from sitting or walking and therefore it is not great for working out. Definitely better for lounging. The bust part is a bit weird and feels too big, not very secure. It can be cute for a casual or lazy outfit but definitely not for activity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this!!! Holds in that tummy!! Is super comfortable and true to size! I loved it! I wore it with an oversized t! Sweatshirt and even a flannel when it was alittle cooler out! I also wore it playing volleyball and didn't have to worry about sand down my pants🤣

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Add to cart! I’ll be buying another!
reviews.reviewText: I am 5’1, 115lb and rectangular-shaped. I bought a Medium in black because I didn’t buy this as snatchwear…I wanted to be smooth and versatile on the regular yet still able to digest my food properly. I get serious heartburn when I wear stuff that’s too “snatchy”. I’m a mom and I needed something that I could wear to bed comfortably so I could pop on a top and some shoes and get the kids to school in the am. I love the bra. It has sewn-in pads, is padded enough to cover my aggressively visible nipple situation and has a nice understated cup shape. I also love the shorts. They don’t dig into my thighs and disappear well enough under my jeans. Love the ribbed fabric also. I’ll buy another for regular rotation.
This particular piece is very low end , with zero “tummy control” as they claim . And no “padded sports bra” it’s very thin and not worth the $27.99 it looks really cheap and thin and is just not it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Horrible y el vendedor no responde
reviews.reviewText: Calidad pésima, el body está muy deformeme quedó enorme y el vendedor no me responde para devolución.
Its ok, i put it on ONCE though and the seam kinda opened.No tummy control. Sheer. Poor Quality.Id pass. Too bad, i really wanted a cute bodysuit for the gym, but this wont do...
Terrible product. Terrible customer service. Do not buy!!!
Laughably cheap, thin material- nothing like the pictures
